channel.title: [Any] Location system with 64+ locations
channel.description:
This works for PI, but I don't remember if you have to convert the code in the tutorial. I've had this list for a really long time and I finally decided to share it.
Do this tutorial first: https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,586658.msg4164663.html#msg4164663
[hr]
Here are the locations (Location enum), replace yours with mine:
[code=java] public enum Location { EDGEVILLE_BANK(new GeometricRegion(new Position(3090, 3487), new Position(3099, 3500)), "in Edgeville bank"), LUMBRIDGE(new GeometricRegion(new Position(3199, 3199), new Position(3265, 3296)), "at Lumbridge"), LUMBRIDGE_SWAMP(new GeometricRegion(new Position(3145, 3160), new Position(3249, 3187)), "in the Lumbridge swamp"), EDGEVILLE(new GeometricRegion(new Position(3057, 3449), new Position(3135, 3519)), "in Edgeville"), VARROCK(new GeometricRegion(new Position(3155, 3364), new Position(3290, 3510)), "in Varrock"), CHILL_ZONE(new GeometricRegion(new Position(3010, 3368), new Position(3031, 3389)), "at the Chill Zone"), FALADOR(new GeometricRegion(new Position(2934, 3311), new Position(3067, 3395)), "in Falador"), RELLEKKA(new GeometricRegion(new Position(2597, 3650), new Position(2691, 3704)), "in Rellekka"), ROCK_CRABS(new GeometricRegion(new Position(2648, 3704), new Position(2725, 3737)), "at the rock crabs"), CATHERBY(new GeometricRegion(new Position(2788, 3415), new Position(2856, 3457)), "in Catherby"), BARROWS(new GeometricRegion(new Position(3530, 3259), new Position(3586, 3323)), "slaying the Barrows Brothers"), GSMINI_1(new GeometricRegion(new Position(2834, 4819), new Position(2855, 4847)), "at GSMini wave 1"), GSMINI_2(new GeometricRegion(new Position(2628, 4808), new Position(2684, 4863)), "at GSMini wave 2"), GSMINI_3(new GeometricRegion(new Position(2707, 4817), new Position(2734, 4848)), "at GSMini wave 3"), GSMINI_4(new GeometricRegion(new Position(2565, 4820), new Position(2601, 4857)), "at GSMini wave 4"), GSMINI_5(new GeometricRegion(new Position(2443, 4810), new Position(2489, 4862)), "at GSMini wave 5"), KBD(new GeometricRegion(new Position(2252, 4674), new Position(2292, 4716)), "slaying the KBD"), DRAYNOR(new GeometricRegion(new Position(3066, 3219), new Position(3143, 3393)), "at Draynor"), MAGE_BANK(new GeometricRegion(new Position(2552, 4706), new Position(2525, 4730)), "at the mage bank"), VARROCK_PK(new GeometricRegion(new Position(3215, 3497), new Position(3267, 3519)), "at Varrock PK"), DONATOR_ZONE(new GeometricRegion(new Position(2508, 4748), new Position(2547, 4794)), "at the donator zone"), APE_ATOLL(new GeometricRegion(new Position(2690, 2690), new Position(2816, 2816)), "at Ape Atoll"), WEST_ARDOUGNE(new GeometricRegion(new Position(2431, 3262), new Position(2559, 3340)), "in West Ardougne"), EAST_ARDOUGNE(new GeometricRegion(new Position(2560, 3260), new Position(2689, 3358)), "in East Ardougne"), BARBARIAN_VILLAGE(new GeometricRegion(new Position(3068, 3402), new Position(3100, 3450)), "at Barbarian Village"), //Desert locations AL_KHARID_1(new GeometricRegion(new Position(3235, 3134), new Position(3335, 3202)), "in Al Kharid"), AL_KHARID_2(new GeometricRegion(new Position(3268, 3198), new Position(3324, 3330)), "in Al Kharid"), AL_KHARID_3(new GeometricRegion(new Position(3323, 3267), new Position(3338, 3330)), "in Al Kharid"),
KHARIDIAN_DESERT_1(new GeometricRegion(new Position(3134, 2879), new Position(3210, 3070)), "in the Kharidian Desert"), KHARIDIAN_DESERT_2(new GeometricRegion(new Position(3186, 2811), new Position(3290, 3133)), "in the Kharidian Desert"), KHARIDIAN_DESERT_3(new GeometricRegion(new Position(3282, 2811), new Position(3342, 3114)), "in the Kharidian Desert"), KHARIDIAN_DESERT_4(new GeometricRegion(new Position(3340, 2811), new Position(3513, 3178)), "in the Kharidian Desert"), //End PEST_CONTROL(new GeometricRegion(new Position(2637, 2637), new Position(2681, 2683)), "at Pest Control"), PEST_CONTROL_GAME(new GeometricRegion(new Position(2621, 2559), new Position(2687, 2622)), "in a Pest Control game"), CRASH_ISLAND(new GeometricRegion(new Position(2882, 2697), new Position(2942, 2744)), "at Crash Island"), WIZARDS_TOWER(new GeometricRegion(new Position(3091, 3144), new Position(3126, 3205)), "at the Wizards' Tower"), MAGE_BANK_OUTSIDE(new GeometricRegion(new Position(3074, 3945), new Position(3114, 3965)), "at the Mage Bank"), MAGE_BANK_INSIDE(new GeometricRegion(new Position(2526, 4706), new Position(2550, 4726)), "at the Mage Bank"), AGILITY_TRAINING_AREA(new GeometricRegion(new Position(2370, 3384), new Position(2511, 3524)), "training Agility"), //TODO: reword for new interface TREE_GNOME_STRONGHOLD(new GeometricRegion(new Position(2370, 3384), new Position(2511, 3524)), "at the Tree Gnome Stronghold"), DROP_PARTY_ROOM(new GeometricRegion(new Position(2725, 3458), new Position(2749, 3480)), "at the Drop Party room"), MUDSKIPPER_POINT(new GeometricRegion(new Position(2977, 3105), new Position(3024, 3151)), "at Mudskipper Point"), PORT_SARIM(new GeometricRegion(new Position(3005, 3197), new Position(3069, 3277)), "in Port Sarim"), DUEL_ARENA(new GeometricRegion(new Position(3323, 3197), new Position(3400, 3293)), "at the Duel arena"), SNOW_PK(new GeometricRegion(new Position(2941, 3889), new Position(2988, 3966)), "at Snow PK"), WILDERNESS_AGILITY_COURSE(new GeometricRegion(new Position(2988, 3912), new Position(3014, 3964)), "at Wilderness Agility"), //TODO: reword for new interface CAMELOT_BANK(new GeometricRegion(new Position(2719, 3487), new Position(2733, 3498)), "in the Camelot bank"), CAMELOT(new GeometricRegion(new Position(2704, 3476), new Position(2737, 3500)), "at Camelot"), SEERS_VILLAGE(new GeometricRegion(new Position(2671, 3452), new Position(2741, 3511)), "at Seers' Village"), ENTRANA(new GeometricRegion(new Position(2800, 3326), new Position(2878, 3395)), "at Entrana"), CRANDOR(new GeometricRegion(new Position(2813, 3229), new Position(2866, 3311)), "at Crandor"), YANILLE(new GeometricRegion(new Position(2533, 3070), new Position(2622, 3112)), "at Yanille"), KALPHITE_QUEEN(new GeometricRegion(new Position(3461, 9477), new Position(3505, 9520)), "at the Kalphite Queen"), //TODO: reword for new interface
FUN_PK(new GeometricRegion(new Position(3648, 3456), new Position(3720, 3535)), "in FunPK"), FUN_PK_2(new GeometricRegion(new Position(2601, 3156), new Position(2607, 3171)), "in FunPK"), MORYTANIA(new GeometricRegion(new Position(3506, 3452), new Position(3685, 3547)), "at Morytania"), CANAFIS(new GeometricRegion(new Position(3472, 3458), new Position(3518, 3516)), "at Canafis"), MORT_MYRE_SWAMP(new GeometricRegion(new Position(3398, 3326), new Position(3586, 3457)), "at the Mort Myre Swamp"), //TODO: reword for new interface MORTTON(new GeometricRegion(new Position(3462, 3258), new Position(3523, 3327)), "at Mort'ton"), BURGH_DE_ROTT(new GeometricRegion(new Position(3470, 3162), new Position(3536, 3259)), "at Burgh de Rott"), //Karamja locations BRIMHAVEN(new GeometricRegion(new Position(2688, 3131), new Position(2813, 3252)), "at Brimhaven"), KARAMJA_VOLCANO(new GeometricRegion(new Position(2813, 3140), new Position(2876, 3209)), "at the Karamja Volcano"), SHILO(new GeometricRegion(new Position(2815, 2944), new Position(2880, 3007)), "at Shilo Village"), KARAMJA_VOLCANO_INSIDE(new GeometricRegion(new Position(2822, 9542), new Position(2868, 9608)), "inside Karamja Volcano"), //TODO: reword for new interface KARAMJA(new GeometricRegion(new Position(2748, 2873), new Position(2975, 3186)), "on Karamja"), KARAMJA_2(new GeometricRegion(new Position(2874, 3136), new Position(2948, 3193)), "on Karamja"), KARAMJA_3(new GeometricRegion(new Position(2944, 3135), new Position(2973, 3162)), "on Karamja"), //etc SLAYER_TOWER(new GeometricRegion(new Position(3404, 3527), new Position(3454, 3581)), "at the Slayer Tower"), //TODO: reword for new interface RIMMINGTON(new GeometricRegion(new Position(2917, 3189), new Position(2998, 3261)), "at Rimmington"), JAIL(new GeometricRegion(new Position(3092, 9505), new Position(3133, 9528)), "in jail"), TAVERLEY(new GeometricRegion(new Position(2873, 3385), new Position(2942, 3527)), "at Taverley"), GODWARS(new GeometricRegion(new Position(2890, 3593), new Position(2929, 3633)), "at Godwars"), MINING_PIT(new GeometricRegion(new Position(3028, 9754), new Position(3075, 9852)), "in the mining pit"), BURTHORPE(new GeometricRegion(new Position(2849, 3528), new Position(2937, 3581)), "at Burthorpe"), MULTI_FUNPK(new GeometricRegion(new Position(2307, 3655), new Position(2361, 3704)), "at Multi FunPK"), PKING_HOTSPOTS(new GeometricRegion(new Position(3073, 2884), new Position(3126, 2931)), "at the PKing Hotspots")
;
private GeometricRegion area; private String locationName;
Location(GeometricRegion area, String name) { this.area = area; this.locationName = name; }
public String getLocationName() { return locationName; }
public GeometricRegion getGeometricPosition() { return area; } } [/code]
This was all hand-done by me, so if you do use it, please use credits. You don't have my permission to repost this anywhere.
[hr]
Some of these locations are for my server and may not make sense for your server. The locations include:
[ol][li]Edgeville bank[/li] [li]Lumbridge[/li] [li]Lumbridge swamp[/li] [li]Edgeville[/li] [li]Varrock[/li] [li]"Chill zone"[/li] [li]Falador[/li] [li]Rellekka[/li] [li]Rock crabs[/li] [li]Catherby[/li] [li]Barrows[/li] [li]"GSMini" waves 1 - 5 (from allstar's godsword mini. These are the runecrafting altar teleports)[/li] [li]King black dragon[/li] [li]Draynor[/li] [li]Mage bank[/li] [li]"Varrock PK"[/li] [li]"Donor zone"[/li] [li]Ape atoll[/li] [li]West Ardougne[/li] [li]East Ardougne[/li] [li]Barbarian village[/li] [li]Al Kharid (most of it)[/li] [li]Kharidian desert[/li] [li]Pest control (island)[/li] [li]Pest control (in game)[/li] [li]Crash island[/li] [li]Wizards' Tower[/li] [li]Mage bank (outside)[/li] [li]Mage bank (inside)[/li] [li]Agility training area[/li] [li]Tree gnome stronghold[/li] [li]Drop party room (old drop party location in Camelot)[/li] [li]Mudskipper point[/li] [li]Port sarim[/li] [li]Duel arena[/li] [li]"Snow PK"[/li] [li]Wilderness agility course[/li] [li]Camelot bank[/li] [li]Camelot[/li] [li]Seers' village[/li] [li]Entrana[/li] [li]Crandor[/li] [li]Yanille[/li] [li]Kalphite queen[/li] [li]"Fun PK"[/li] [li]Morytania[/li] [li]Canafis[/li] [li]Mort Myre swamp[/li] [li]Mort'ton[/li] [li]Burgh de Rott[/li] [li]Brimhaven[/li] [li]Shilo village[/li] [li]Karamja volcano[/li] [li]Karamja volcano (inside)[/li] [li]Karamja[/li] [li]Slayer tower[/li] [li]Rimmington[/li] [li]"Jail"[/li] [li]Taverly[/li] [li]"Godwars" (not the real location)[/li] [li]"Mining pit"[/li] [li]Burthorpe[/li] [li]"Multi FunPK"[/li] [li]"PKing hotspots" (custom map)[/li][/ol]
[hr]
After this snippet, typing ::playerlist or ::plist will look like this: [img]https://imagizer.imageshack.us/v2/371x836q90/537/xpOvxw.png[/img]
[hr]
Also included commands (for PI, but can be converted very easily):
Player list (shows all the players online with their location) (probably wasn't done the most efficient way): [code=java] if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("playerlist") || (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("plist")) || (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("playerson"))) { c.clearPlayersInterface(); c.sendMessage("There are currently [@blu@"+PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount()+ "@bla@] players online."); c.getPA().sendFrame126("Server name - Online Players", 8144); c.getPA().sendFrame126("@dbl@Amount of players online: [" + PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount()+ "]", 8145);
int line = 8147; for (int i = 1; i < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i++) { Client p = c.getClient(i); if (!c.validClient(i)) continue; if (p.playerName != null) { String title = ""; if (p.playerRights == 1) { title = "@red@Mod@dbl@, "; } else if (p.playerRights == 2) { title = "@red@Admin@dbl@, "; } else if (p.playerRights == 3) { title = "@red@Owner@dbl@, "; } else if (p.playerRights == 4) { title = "@gre@Donator@dbl@, "; } title += "level-" + p.combatLevel; String extra = ""; if (c.playerRights > 0) { extra = "(" + p.playerId + ") "; } c.getPA().sendFrame126("@dre@" + extra + p.playerName + "@dbl@ ("+ title + ") is " + p.getRegion().getLocation() + ".", line); line++; } } c.getPA().showInterface(8134); c.flushOutStream(); } [/code]
[hr]
Hide from the player list (in case someone is doing a hide-and-seek event or whatever, it will show their location as "unknown" until they relog): [code=java] if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("hideplist") || playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("hidefromplist") || playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("plisthide") || playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("hplist")) { c.isHiddenFromPList = true; c.sendMessage("You are temporarily hidden from the playerlist until logout."); c.sendMessage("You can also access this command by typing ::hplist"); } [/code]
Add this to client.java: [code=java] public boolean isHiddenFromPList = false;[/code]
[hr]
I used these 2 tools to help me with those coordinates:
1: Location tool (made by myself with the help of netbeans GUI maker): [b]Download:[/b] https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/20987624/Location.jar Looks like this: [img]https://imagizer.imageshack.us/v2/806x714q90/902/50Xph7.png[/img]
2: World Map (I don't remember where I got this, but credits to whoever): This tells you the coordinates of wherever your mouse is on the map. You can zoom in and move all around. It's open-source and the java file is included. [b]Download:[/b] https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/20987624/WorldMap.zip Picture: [img]https://imagizer.imageshack.us/v2/739x499q90/911/gsrMb4.png[/img]

item.title: [Any] Location system with 64+ locations
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Int Bauk:

it’s ok but personally i wouldn’t use an enum. i would just load the regions on startup

this.
save it in a file and just load it one at startup, reload it if you ever change it during game (optional).

Read full topic

item.title: [Any] Location system with 64+ locations
item.dc:creator: @Int_Bauk Int Bauk
item.description:
@Int_Bauk wrote:

it’s ok but personally i wouldn’t use an enum. i would just load the regions on startup

Read full topic

item.title: [Any] Location system with 64+ locations
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

This works for PI, but I don’t remember if you have to convert the code in the tutorial. I’ve had this list for a really long time and I finally decided to share it.

Do this tutorial first:
https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,586658.msg4164663.html#msg4164663

[hr]

Here are the locations (Location enum), replace yours with mine:

	public enum Location {
		EDGEVILLE_BANK(new GeometricRegion(new Position(3090, 3487), new Position(3099, 3500)), "in Edgeville bank"),
		LUMBRIDGE(new GeometricRegion(new Position(3199, 3199), new Position(3265, 3296)), "at Lumbridge"),
		LUMBRIDGE_SWAMP(new GeometricRegion(new Position(3145, 3160), new Position(3249, 3187)), "in the Lumbridge swamp"),
		EDGEVILLE(new GeometricRegion(new Position(3057, 3449), new Position(3135, 3519)), "in Edgeville"),
		VARROCK(new GeometricRegion(new Position(3155, 3364), new Position(3290, 3510)), "in Varrock"),
		CHILL_ZONE(new GeometricRegion(new Position(3010, 3368), new Position(3031, 3389)), "at the Chill Zone"),
		FALADOR(new GeometricRegion(new Position(2934, 3311), new Position(3067, 3395)), "in Falador"),
		RELLEKKA(new GeometricRegion(new Position(2597, 3650), new Position(2691, 3704)), "in Rellekka"),
		ROCK_CRABS(new GeometricRegion(new Position(2648, 3704), new Position(2725, 3737)), "at the rock crabs"),
		CATHERBY(new GeometricRegion(new Position(2788, 3415), new Position(2856, 3457)), "in Catherby"),
		BARROWS(new GeometricRegion(new Position(3530, 3259), new Position(3586, 3323)), "slaying the Barrows Brothers"),
		GSMINI_1(new GeometricRegion(new Position(2834, 4819), new Position(2855, 4847)), "at GSMini wave 1"),
		GSMINI_2(new GeometricRegion(new Position(2628, 4808), new Position(2684, 4863)), "at GSMini wave 2"),
		GSMINI_3(new GeometricRegion(new Position(2707, 4817), new Position(2734, 4848)), "at GSMini wave 3"),
		GSMINI_4(new GeometricRegion(new Position(2565, 4820), new Position(2601, 4857)), "at GSMini wave 4"),
		GSMINI_5(new GeometricRegion(new Position(2443, 4810), new Position(2489, 4862)), "at GSMini wave 5"),
		KBD(new GeometricRegion(new Position(2252, 4674), new Position(2292, 4716)), "slaying the KBD"),
		DRAYNOR(new GeometricRegion(new Position(3066, 3219), new Position(3143, 3393)), "at Draynor"),
		MAGE_BANK(new GeometricRegion(new Position(2552, 4706), new Position(2525, 4730)), "at the mage bank"),
		VARROCK_PK(new GeometricRegion(new Position(3215, 3497), new Position(3267, 3519)), "at Varrock PK"),
		DONATOR_ZONE(new GeometricRegion(new Position(2508, 4748), new Position(2547, 4794)), "at the donator zone"),
		APE_ATOLL(new GeometricRegion(new Position(2690, 2690), new Position(2816, 2816)), "at Ape Atoll"),
		WEST_ARDOUGNE(new GeometricRegion(new Position(2431, 3262), new Position(2559, 3340)), "in West Ardougne"),
		EAST_ARDOUGNE(new GeometricRegion(new Position(2560, 3260), new Position(2689, 3358)), "in East Ardougne"),
		BARBARIAN_VILLAGE(new GeometricRegion(new Position(3068, 3402), new Position(3100, 3450)), "at Barbarian Village"),
		//Desert locations
		AL_KHARID_1(new GeometricRegion(new Position(3235, 3134), new Position(3335, 3202)), "in Al Kharid"),
		AL_KHARID_2(new GeometricRegion(new Position(3268, 3198), new Position(3324, 3330)), "in Al Kharid"),
		AL_KHARID_3(new GeometricRegion(new Position(3323, 3267), new Position(3338, 3330)), "in Al Kharid"),
		
		KHARIDIAN_DESERT_1(new GeometricRegion(new Position(3134, 2879), new Position(3210, 3070)), "in the Kharidian Desert"),
		KHARIDIAN_DESERT_2(new GeometricRegion(new Position(3186, 2811), new Position(3290, 3133)), "in the Kharidian Desert"),
		KHARIDIAN_DESERT_3(new GeometricRegion(new Position(3282, 2811), new Position(3342, 3114)), "in the Kharidian Desert"),
		KHARIDIAN_DESERT_4(new GeometricRegion(new Position(3340, 2811), new Position(3513, 3178)), "in the Kharidian Desert"),
		//End
		PEST_CONTROL(new GeometricRegion(new Position(2637, 2637), new Position(2681, 2683)), "at Pest Control"),
		PEST_CONTROL_GAME(new GeometricRegion(new Position(2621, 2559), new Position(2687, 2622)), "in a Pest Control game"),
		CRASH_ISLAND(new GeometricRegion(new Position(2882, 2697), new Position(2942, 2744)), "at Crash Island"),
		WIZARDS_TOWER(new GeometricRegion(new Position(3091, 3144), new Position(3126, 3205)), "at the Wizards' Tower"),
		MAGE_BANK_OUTSIDE(new GeometricRegion(new Position(3074, 3945), new Position(3114, 3965)), "at the Mage Bank"),
		MAGE_BANK_INSIDE(new GeometricRegion(new Position(2526, 4706), new Position(2550, 4726)), "at the Mage Bank"),
		AGILITY_TRAINING_AREA(new GeometricRegion(new Position(2370, 3384), new Position(2511, 3524)), "training Agility"), //TODO: reword for new interface
		TREE_GNOME_STRONGHOLD(new GeometricRegion(new Position(2370, 3384), new Position(2511, 3524)), "at the Tree Gnome Stronghold"),
		DROP_PARTY_ROOM(new GeometricRegion(new Position(2725, 3458), new Position(2749, 3480)), "at the Drop Party room"),
		MUDSKIPPER_POINT(new GeometricRegion(new Position(2977, 3105), new Position(3024, 3151)), "at Mudskipper Point"),
		PORT_SARIM(new GeometricRegion(new Position(3005, 3197), new Position(3069, 3277)), "in Port Sarim"),
		DUEL_ARENA(new GeometricRegion(new Position(3323, 3197), new Position(3400, 3293)), "at the Duel arena"),
		SNOW_PK(new GeometricRegion(new Position(2941, 3889), new Position(2988, 3966)), "at Snow PK"),
		WILDERNESS_AGILITY_COURSE(new GeometricRegion(new Position(2988, 3912), new Position(3014, 3964)), "at Wilderness Agility"), //TODO: reword for new interface
		CAMELOT_BANK(new GeometricRegion(new Position(2719, 3487), new Position(2733, 3498)), "in the Camelot bank"),
		CAMELOT(new GeometricRegion(new Position(2704, 3476), new Position(2737, 3500)), "at Camelot"),
		SEERS_VILLAGE(new GeometricRegion(new Position(2671, 3452), new Position(2741, 3511)), "at Seers' Village"),
		ENTRANA(new GeometricRegion(new Position(2800, 3326), new Position(2878, 3395)), "at Entrana"),
		CRANDOR(new GeometricRegion(new Position(2813, 3229), new Position(2866, 3311)), "at Crandor"),
		YANILLE(new GeometricRegion(new Position(2533, 3070), new Position(2622, 3112)), "at Yanille"),
		KALPHITE_QUEEN(new GeometricRegion(new Position(3461, 9477), new Position(3505, 9520)), "at the Kalphite Queen"), //TODO: reword for new interface

		FUN_PK(new GeometricRegion(new Position(3648, 3456), new Position(3720, 3535)), "in FunPK"),
		FUN_PK_2(new GeometricRegion(new Position(2601, 3156), new Position(2607, 3171)), "in FunPK"),
		MORYTANIA(new GeometricRegion(new Position(3506, 3452), new Position(3685, 3547)), "at Morytania"),
		CANAFIS(new GeometricRegion(new Position(3472, 3458), new Position(3518, 3516)), "at Canafis"),
		MORT_MYRE_SWAMP(new GeometricRegion(new Position(3398, 3326), new Position(3586, 3457)), "at the Mort Myre Swamp"), //TODO: reword for new interface
		MORTTON(new GeometricRegion(new Position(3462, 3258), new Position(3523, 3327)), "at Mort'ton"),
		BURGH_DE_ROTT(new GeometricRegion(new Position(3470, 3162), new Position(3536, 3259)), "at Burgh de Rott"),
		//Karamja locations
		BRIMHAVEN(new GeometricRegion(new Position(2688, 3131), new Position(2813, 3252)), "at Brimhaven"),
		KARAMJA_VOLCANO(new GeometricRegion(new Position(2813, 3140), new Position(2876, 3209)), "at the Karamja Volcano"),
		SHILO(new GeometricRegion(new Position(2815, 2944), new Position(2880, 3007)), "at Shilo Village"),
		KARAMJA_VOLCANO_INSIDE(new GeometricRegion(new Position(2822, 9542), new Position(2868, 9608)), "inside Karamja Volcano"), //TODO: reword for new interface
		KARAMJA(new GeometricRegion(new Position(2748, 2873), new Position(2975, 3186)), "on Karamja"),
		KARAMJA_2(new GeometricRegion(new Position(2874, 3136), new Position(2948, 3193)), "on Karamja"),
		KARAMJA_3(new GeometricRegion(new Position(2944, 3135), new Position(2973, 3162)), "on Karamja"),
		//etc
		SLAYER_TOWER(new GeometricRegion(new Position(3404, 3527), new Position(3454, 3581)), "at the Slayer Tower"), //TODO: reword for new interface
		RIMMINGTON(new GeometricRegion(new Position(2917, 3189), new Position(2998, 3261)), "at Rimmington"),
		JAIL(new GeometricRegion(new Position(3092, 9505), new Position(3133, 9528)), "in jail"),
		TAVERLEY(new GeometricRegion(new Position(2873, 3385), new Position(2942, 3527)), "at Taverley"),
		GODWARS(new GeometricRegion(new Position(2890, 3593), new Position(2929, 3633)), "at Godwars"),
		MINING_PIT(new GeometricRegion(new Position(3028, 9754), new Position(3075, 9852)), "in the mining pit"),
		BURTHORPE(new GeometricRegion(new Position(2849, 3528), new Position(2937, 3581)), "at Burthorpe"),
		MULTI_FUNPK(new GeometricRegion(new Position(2307, 3655), new Position(2361, 3704)), "at Multi FunPK"),
		PKING_HOTSPOTS(new GeometricRegion(new Position(3073, 2884), new Position(3126, 2931)), "at the PKing Hotspots")

		;

		private GeometricRegion area;
		private String locationName;

		Location(GeometricRegion area, String name) {
			this.area = area;
			this.locationName = name;
		}

		public String getLocationName() {
			return locationName;
		}

		public GeometricRegion getGeometricPosition() {
			return area;
		}
	}

This was all hand-done by me, so if you do use it, please use credits. You don’t have my permission to repost this anywhere.

[hr]

[hr]

After this snippet, typing ::playerlist or ::plist will look like this:

[hr]

Also included commands (for PI, but can be converted very easily):

Player list (shows all the players online with their location) (probably wasn’t done the most efficient way):

			if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("playerlist") || (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("plist")) || (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("playerson"))) {
				c.clearPlayersInterface();
				c.sendMessage("There are currently [@blu@"+PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount()+ "@bla@] players online.");
				c.getPA().sendFrame126("Server name - Online Players", 8144);
				c.getPA().sendFrame126("@dbl@Amount of players online: [" + PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount()+ "]", 8145);

				int line = 8147;
				for (int i = 1; i < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i++) {
					Client p = c.getClient(i);
					if (!c.validClient(i))
						continue;
					if (p.playerName != null) {
						String title = "";
						if (p.playerRights == 1) {
							title = "@red@Mod@dbl@, ";
						} else if (p.playerRights == 2) {
							title = "@red@Admin@dbl@, ";
						} else if (p.playerRights == 3) {
							title = "@red@Owner@dbl@, ";
						} else if (p.playerRights == 4) {
							title = "@gre@Donator@dbl@, ";
						}
						title += "level-" + p.combatLevel;
						String extra = "";
						if (c.playerRights > 0) {
							extra = "(" + p.playerId + ") ";
						}
						c.getPA().sendFrame126("@dre@" + extra + p.playerName + "@dbl@ ("+ title + ") is " + p.getRegion().getLocation() + ".", line);
						line++;
					}
				}
				c.getPA().showInterface(8134);
				c.flushOutStream();
			}

[hr]

Hide from the player list (in case someone is doing a hide-and-seek event or whatever, it will show their location as “unknown” until they relog):

			if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("hideplist") || playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("hidefromplist") || playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("plisthide") || playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("hplist")) {
				c.isHiddenFromPList = true;
				c.sendMessage("You are temporarily hidden from the playerlist until logout.");
				c.sendMessage("You can also access this command by typing ::hplist");
			}

[hr]

I used these 2 tools to help me with those coordinates:

1: Location tool (made by myself with the help of netbeans GUI maker):
Download: https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/20987624/Location.jar
Looks like this:

2: World Map (I don’t remember where I got this, but credits to whoever):
This tells you the coordinates of wherever your mouse is on the map. You can zoom in and move all around. It’s open-source and the java file is included.
Download: https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/20987624/WorldMap.zip
